version_description:
• Added text alignment (toggle Left/Right/Centre) from the fonts view
• Added toggle of play/pause to text animations by tapping the animation button more than once
• Added layer reordering to bring forward the active layer that you are editing
•

• Added text alignment (toggle Left/Right/Centre) from the fonts view
• Added toggle of play/pause to text animations by tapping the animation button more than once
• Added layer reordering to bring forward the active layer that you are editing
•

- Integrated Google Firebase with analytics, crashlytics and notifications
- 4:5 ratio export format
- Support for most Latin Diacritic characters
- Added character fallbacks for most non-supported characters
- New background pattern animation

- Integrated Google Firebase with analytics, crashlytics and notifications
- 4:5 ratio export format
- Support for most Latin Diacritic characters
- Added character fallbacks for most non-supported characters
- New background pattern animation

Thanks for creating with PLAYS! Here's whats new:
• We've added camera roll priority slots so you can keep your favourites at the top and easily selectable.
• Your camera roll assets are now automatically reloaded and updated when you relaunch the

• Full screen mode: Edit and view your compositions in full screen!
• New text animations
• Removal of the first screen: dive straight into creating.
• Various bug fixes including a resolution for an intermittent crash caused by changing the text

• Full screen mode: Edit and view your compositions in full screen!
• New text animations
• Removal of the first screen: dive straight into creating.
• Various bug fixes including a resolution for an intermittent crash caused by changing the text

This release focuses on improvements to the asset load and render experience:

• Improved speed of the export renderer
• Resolved various crashes caused by export rendering
• Minor usability improvements to the export rendering journey
• Im
